title: Modelling Foam

description: This game of Blow Froggy Blow is sure to entertain the kids this Passover. | Blow Froggy Blow

title: Chanukah Magic Paint Sheets
description: Time to get artistic with this Magic Chanukah Painting Book! This set is perfect for introducing your little ones to Chanukah. Just dip a brush into water touch one of the coloured squares and then paint over the pictures. With 10 Chanukah themed pictures to choose from, this painting set is bound to be a hit with your little budding artist! Great for doing alone or with friends.

title: Passover Activity Set
description: This Passover Colouring Set is the perfect gift for any child. It includes 4 Passover themed colouring sheets as well as 4 activity sheets. Set includes 7 colouring pencils to make the images come to life. Great for play, education, birthday parties... etc.

title: Magnet Art
description: A great activity for children this Chanukah to make their own Chanukah themed magnets. Colour in and push out any of the ten pre-cut Chanukah characters to brighten up any fridge / magnet surface this Chanukah. Pack includes two A5 magnetic sheets and five coloured pencils.

title: Passover Straws
description: These fun Passover themed wiggly straws are the perfect way to make your Seder drinks come alive. The packet contains 4 coloured straws.

title: Passover Froggy Shooter
description: Let kids enjoy themselves this Passover with this Passover Froggy Shooter. This air pressurised foam froggy shooter comes with 8 foam frogs for children to shoot.

title: Chanukah Foam Shapes
description: These Chanukah foam shapes consists of five different coloured glitter sheets. Each sheet has 37 Chanukah themed images to cut out (total 185 pieces). This is a great introduction for children to learn synonymous Chanukah shapes in a fun and creative way. You won’t need to worry about glue or sticky tape as these pre-cut foam shapes are self-adhesive and ready to use. Simply peel away the backing for instance use. Each self-adhesive foam sticker is made of soft sponge, these 3D foam shapes are safe and easy to apply, perfect for kids’ to use safely at home or in school.

description:

Can be used with cookie dough, pastry, icing, marzipan, modelling clay and more. | Chanukah Cookie Cutters

title: Purim Activity Set | Jewish Gifts, Cards & Party Supplies
description:
This Purim Activity Set makes the perfect gift for any child, offering hours of fun and creativity. The set includes two Purim-themed scratch art pictures, a word search, spot-the-difference puzzle, colouring pages, and a variety of other engaging activity sheets.

It also comes with a sheet of stickers and a Purim-themed background scene, perfect for imaginative play. To bring the scratch art pictures to life, the set includes four crayons and a stylus.

Ideal for playtime, learning, birthday parties, or keeping children entertained during the Purim celebrations, this activity set combines fun and education in one festive package. | Purim Activity Set

title: Scratch Art
description: These exciting Chanukah themed scratch art images are a great way to keep kids entertained. Simply just scratch away with the stylus included to reveal a rainbow of colours to bring the drawings to life. Pack includes two scratch art Chanukah themed images and a wood stylus.

title: Colour Your Own Challah Cover | Jewish Gifts, Cards & Party Supplies
description:
Make Shabbat extra special with this Colour Your Own Challah Cover, perfect for encouraging creativity and family fun. Children can personalise their own challah cover using the included felt tip pens, creating a unique and meaningful addition to the Shabbat table.

The pack includes one challah cover measuring 38 cm × 28 cm / 15 in × 11 in and six bright felt tip pens, making it easy to start colouring straight away. Designed especially for young children, this activity is ideal for ages 3 years and over.

A wonderful blend of creativity and tradition, this colour-your-own challah cover makes a thoughtful gift and a fun educational activity for Shabbat, Jewish holidays, or rainy days at home. | Colour Your Own Challah Cover

title: Sukkot Create and colour your own Sukkah | Jewish Gifts, Cards & Party Supplies
description: Build your very own model sukkah this holiday season. Our amazing Sukkah set has now been updated to include cardboard roof slates and paper palm leaves just like the real thing!  Children can personalise the Sukkah with their own colours either before or once building is complete. | Sukkot Create and colour your own Sukkah

title: Chanukah Bouncy Balls
description: These colourful Chanukah themed bouncy balls are out of this world! Playful kids will be quick to pick their favourite Chanukah character, then fling them in the air, whizz them along the floor, bounce them on the ground, throw, catch and so much more. They may be very simple but they’re brilliant to have on hand, perfect for a rainy day or garden play. Juggle and spin, try out tricks, whatever you choose your kids will be entertained for hours! Bounce, throw, catch, and play great for kids this Chanukah.

title: Chanukah Mini Ball Puzzle Game | Jewish Gifts, Cards & Party Supplies
description: These Chanukah Mini Ball Puzzle Games are a fun and festive challenge for puzzlers of all ages! Guide the tiny silver ball through twists and turns until you land it in the hole, but stay focused, as each puzzle offers a new festive design and a fresh test of skill. Compact and portable, they’re perfect for on-the-go fun. Kids will love picking their favourite design and seeing who can master the maze first. Roll, tilt, and play your way to victory! | Chanukah Mini Ball Puzzle Game
